    • Uses of InvalidAuctionAction in auction

      Methods in auction that throw InvalidAuctionAction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Auction.addBid(Bid newBid)
      Adds a new bid to the auction.
      void AuctionTest.addBidTest1()
      Tests the addBid method, it checks that after a successful addition of a bid the information of a bid is set correctly
      void AuctionTest.addBidTest2()
      Tests the addBid method, it checks the return of the method is correct.
      void AuctionTest.addBidTest3()
      Tests the addBid method when the Auction is in a state when no bids can be made (unavailable).
      void AuctionTest.addBidTest4()
      Tests the addBid method when the bid price is below the auction bas price.
      void Auction.addParticipant(ContractCustomer newParticipant)
      Adds a participant to the auction
      void AuctionTest.addParticipantTest1()
      Tests the addition of a new participant to the auction
      void AuctionTest.addParticipantTest2()
      Tests an invalid addition of a participant when the auction is not available
      void Auction.cancel()
      Cancels the auction.
      void AuctionTest.cancelTest1()
      Tests an ordinary successful cancellation of an auction
      void AuctionTest.cancelTest2()
      Tests an invalid cancellation of an auction.
      void Auction.close()
      Closes the auction.
      void AuctionTest.closeTest1()
      Tests an ordinary successful auction closing,
      void AuctionTest.closeTetst2()
      Test an invalid closing when the user tries to close the auction but its duration its not over yet.
      void AuctionTest.closeTetst3()
      Test an invalid closing when the user tries to close the auction but not bids have been made yet.
      int Auction.daysRemaining()
      Calculates the days remaining of a running auction.
      void AuctionTest.daysRemainingTest1()
      Tests the daysRemaining method when its expected result is maximum
      void AuctionTest.daysRemainingTest2()
      Tests the daysRemaining method when its expected result is minimum
      void AuctionTest.daysRemainingTest3()
      Tests the daysRemaining method when it is executed in an invalid state
      java.time.LocalDate Auction.getEndDate()
      Returns the closing date of the auction
      Bid Auction.getMaxBid()
      Gets the current highest bid made in the auction
      void AuctionTest.getMaxBidTest1()
      Tests the getMaxBidTest method, assuring it selects the appropriate bid
      void AuctionTest.getMaxBidTest2()
      Tests the getMaxBidTest method when no bids have been made yet
      void AuctionTest.getMaxBidTest3()
      Tests the getMaxBidTest method when no bids have been made and has been cancelled.
      ContractCustomer Auction.getWinner()
      Gets the current winner of the auction
      void AuctionTest.getWinnerTest1()
      Tests getWinner method, in a standard success scenario
      void AuctionTest.getWinnerTest2()
      Tests getWinner method in an invalid state of the auction.
